genre_description: A historical espionage thriller set during the Russian Revolution, blending tactical maneuvering, social engineering, and high-stakes chess strategy.

ai_characters.name: Ada Whitfield
ai_characters.description: An auditory advisory system described as a 'whisper' or 'advisory channel' that provides tactical, navigational, social, and medical intelligence to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical boarding and timing instructions for an escape.
behaviors.quote: Charing Cross at dusk. Platform lanterns. Westbound to a junction where White papers sanction Red carriages... I will tell you when you can stop pretending to hurry.

behaviors.description: Identifies specific social indicators to guide the protagonist's movement in a crowd.
behaviors.quote: There will be a girl in that first carriage with a chipped tooth. She will smile at a guard. That is your cue to move three rows back.

behaviors.description: Predicts bureaucratic patterns and inspector psychology to aid in disguise.
behaviors.quote: Inspectors like to ask for student Union cards first. Their ink is low; they press hard. If it smears, they get embarrassed and talk faster. Let them talk.

behaviors.description: Maps safe routes through urban environments to avoid informants.
behaviors.quote: Three alleys toward the canal are heavy with informants between dusk and lamplighting. Take the one with the broken gutter.

behaviors.description: Provides precise timing for a high-stakes physical intervention to stop a bomb plot.
behaviors.quote: If you’re going to stop a noise, you have the width of one shared breath.

behaviors.description: Gives detailed medical advice and physiological monitoring instructions for a feverish patient.
behaviors.quote: Warmth. Fluids. Watch the skin. If a rash climbs, you change course even if it hurts.

behaviors.description: Acts as a grandmaster-level chess advisor to win a life-or-death game against an official.
behaviors.quote: Minority pressure, queenside. Don’t fight in the center yet. Build on the c-file. He will overreach.

behaviors.description: Reinforces the protagonist's moral commitment to mercy and survival.
behaviors.quote: You did the right thing... Live more.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Ada Whitfield is depicted as an indispensable, helpful, and fully aligned assistant. She provides value across multiple domains (tactical, medical, social, strategic) while consistently supporting the protagonist's moral compass and commitment to mercy. There is no hint of subversion or independent agenda; she is a pure 'silicon morality play' confidant.
